name: taxhacker
tagline: A toolkit for automated and transparent tax calculations
description: TaxHacker is a self-hosted script and toolkit that helps calculate and optimize income or investment taxes using country-specific rules. It focuses on automation, reproducible calculations, and transparent tax estimation from local data.

features.title: Tax Calculation
features.description: Calculate income and investment taxes using country-specific rules and regulations

features.title: Automated Processing
features.description: Process financial data automatically to generate tax estimates and reports

features.title: Reproducible Results
features.description: Ensure consistent calculations with documented formulas and transparent methodology

features.title: Data Privacy
features.description: Keep all financial data on your own infrastructure for maximum privacy and security

features.title: Multiple Jurisdictions
features.description: Support for various tax jurisdictions with customizable rules and rates

features.title: REST API
features.description: Track capital gains, dividends, and other investment income for accurate tax reporting

features.title: Optimization Suggestions
features.description: Identify potential tax optimization strategies based on your financial situation

features.title: Report Generation
features.description: Generate detailed tax reports and summaries for filing or review purposes
